page.title: 18TRANSPORT.
page.content: The two main roads running through this area are the A38 and the A37. Although there are some bus services most people use their own cars as transport. {Axbridge Motors}is a small garage in Axbridge- they have an agency for Ford cars. The range of cars includes the{FIESTA {ESCORT ORION SIERRA CAPRI AND GRANADA Prices for these cars are as follows: Fiesta........basic model Â£3998 Escort........basic model Â£4585 Orion.........L model Â£5884 Sierra........1.8 Ghia Â£9195 Capri.........2.8 injection Â£9875 Granada.......Scorpio Â£15550 Petrol costs about Â£2.00 a gallon it is because of this high cost that the smaller cars are most popular. Bicycles are used by many people but B.M.X. cycles only by the youngsters.
